member.name: ENCRYPTED_LM_OWF_PASSWORD
member.summary: The ENCRYPTED_LM_OWF_PASSWORD stores a user's encrypted Lan Manager (LM) one-way function (OWF) password hash.

member.name: ENCRYPTED_LM_OWF_PASSWORD.data
member.summary: An array of structures that contain an encrypted LM OWF password hash. The contents of the array are calculated using the OldLmPasswordHashEncryptedWithNewNtPasswordHash() function as defined in RFC 2433, section A.16.
